title: Barcelona 3 Seater Bench Deep Red/Walnut
body: Mies Van Der Rohe designed the Barcelona 3 Seats for the German pavilion at the 1929 International Exposition in Barcelona. The Barcelona 3-seater sofa completes any office or living room with a high-quality designer piece. Humanism design lets you really stretch out for maximum relaxation. The wide bench has plenty of room for three people, and the flat position creates a luxurious garden bed.
